Download Frequently Asked Questions 1. What is Cricketx? Crocketx is a leading online platform for fantasy sport, which allows fans of the cricket to create their own virtual teams and compete for prizes, based on the real performances of players in matches. 2. How to register for Cricketx? To register, go to our site and click on the "Registration" button. Fill the necessary fields with your personal data and follow the instructions on the screen. After confirmation of registration, you can start creating teams and participate in competitions. 3. What types of games and tournaments are available on Cricketx? Cricketx presents various types of fantasy-games and tournaments, including daily games, seasonal leagues and special tournaments dedicated to large events in the world of the cricket. You can choose a format that you like best and start competing with other players. 4. How are Cricketx platform glasses calculated? Glasses are awarded on the basis of real performances of the players you have chosen in matches. For each action, such as clogged wounds, taken weeks, assists made, etc., certain glasses are charged. Detailed information about the glass calculation system can be found in the "Rules and Conditions" section on our website. 5. What prizes can you win on Cricketx? Various prizes are available on our platform, including cash awards, gift certificates and exclusive goods. Prizes depend on the type of tournament and its conditions. The higher your place in the standings, the more chances to receive valuable awards. 6. How can I contact Cricketx customers support? If you have questions or problems, you can contact our support service through the "Contacts" section on the site. We offer several communication channels, including e -mail, chat and phone. Our support team is ready to help you at any time. Testimonials "CricketX has completely transformed my cricket experience. The app is intuitive, easy to use, and offers a wide range of contests. I've won some great prizes too!" Rahul S. "As a cricket enthusiast, CricketX has been a game-changer for me. I love how I can create my own team and compete with friends. The app's live updates keep me hooked!" Priya M. "I've tried a few fantasy cricket apps, but CricketX stands out for its user-friendly interface and detailed player statistics. The contests are competitive, and the rewards are worth it." Karan R. "CricketX is my favorite app for fantasy cricket. It's reliable, secure, and offers a great variety of contests. The customer support is also very responsive, which is a big plus." Anjali K. pages.policy: CricketX Privacy Policy: Learn How We Protect Your Personal Information, Data Usage, and Security Measures. Understand Your Privacy Rights and How We Ensure the Confidentiality and Integrity of Your Data on Our Fantasy Cricket Platform CricketX Terms and Conditions Privacy Policy Privacy Policy 1. Collection of Personal Information 1.1. CricketX collects personal information that you provide to us when you create an account, use our services, or participate in promotional activities. This information may include: * Your name, email address, and phone number * Your date of birth and gender * Your location * Your payment information * Your gameplay data 1.2. We may also collect information about your use of our services, such as the pages you visit, the features you use, and the time you spend on our platform. * Provide and improve our services * Personalize your experience * Communicate with you about your account and our services * Offer you promotional materials and offers 2.2. We do not sell or rent your personal information to third parties. 3.1. We may disclose your personal information to third parties in the following circumstances: * To service providers who help us provide our services * To comply with legal or regulatory requirements * To protect our platform and users 3.2. We require our service providers to take appropriate measures to protect your personal information. 4. Data Retention 4.1. We retain your personal information for as long as your account is active or as necessary to provide our services. 5. Your Rights 5.1. You have the right to: * Access your personal information * Correct your personal information * Delete your personal information * Restrict the processing of your personal information * Object to the processing of your personal information 6. Security 6.1. We take reasonable measures to protect your personal information from unauthorized access, use, or disclosure. 6.2. However, no security system is perfect, and we cannot guarantee the complete security of your personal information. 7. Children's Privacy 7.1. CricketX is not directed to children under the age of 18. 7.2. We do not knowingly collect personal information from children under the age of 18. 8. Changes to this Privacy Policy 8.1. We may update this Privacy Policy from time to time to reflect changes in our practices or to comply with legal or regulatory requirements. 8.2. We encourage you to review this Privacy Policy regularly for any changes. 9. Disclaimer: This Website is only for 18+ users. Please Leave This Site If you are from Telangana, Orissa, Assam, Sikkim, and Nagaland. Beware of fraudsters, We only promote online fantasy sports. © 2024. All rights reserved.
pages.terms-conditions: CricketX Terms and Conditions: Understand the Rules, User Responsibilities, Privacy Policies, and Fair Play Guidelines. Stay Informed and Enjoy a Secure Fantasy Cricket Experience on CricketX CricketX Terms and Conditions Privacy Policy Terms & Conditions 1. Acceptance of Terms By accessing or using the App, you ('User', 'you' or 'your') agree to be bound by these Terms. If you disagree with any part of the Terms, you may not access or use the App. 2. Changes to the Terms We may revise these Terms at any time by updating this page. It is your responsibility to check the Terms periodically for changes. Your continued use of the App following the posting of any changes constitutes your acceptance of those changes. 3. App Description CricketX is a mobile application designed to provide users with a comprehensive platform for all things cricket. The App offers features including: Track live scores, ball-by-ball commentary, and match highlights from various cricket leagues and tournaments. Stay updated with the latest cricket news, player information, and in-depth analysis. Engage with fellow cricket fans, share your views, and join discussions. 4. Eligibility To use the App, you must be at least 18 years of age or have the consent of your parent or legal guardian. 5. User Accounts You may be required to create an account to access certain features of the App. You are solely responsible for maintaining the confidentiality of your account information, including your username and password. You agree to immediately notify CricketX of any unauthorized use of your account or any other breach of security. CricketX reserves the right to terminate your account at any time, for any reason, without prior notice. 6. Content - The App may allow users to submit or post content, including text, images, videos, and other materials ('User Content'). You are solely responsible for the User Content you upload or submit. - You represent and warrant that you own all rights to or have obtained all necessary permissions and licenses for the User Content, and that your User Content will not violate any applicable laws or the rights of any third party. - You grant CricketX a non-exclusive, worldwide, royalty-free license to use, reproduce, modify, adapt, publish, translate, distribute, publicly display, perform, and create derivative works from your User Content in any media or format. CricketX Content: - CricketX owns all right, title, and interest in and to the content, including, but not limited to, text, graphics, logos, images, videos, and audio ('CricketX Content') contained on the App. - You may not reproduce, modify, distribute, display, or perform any CricketX Content without the express written permission of CricketX. 7. Intellectual Property The App, including its content, is protected by intellectual property rights, including copyrights and trademarks. You may not use the App or its content for any commercial purpose without CricketX's express written consent. 8. User Conduct You agree to use the App in a responsible and ethical manner and comply with all applicable laws and regulations. You may not: - Use the App for any unlawful or unauthorized purpose; - Violate any local, state, national, or international law; - Infringe upon the intellectual property rights of CricketX or any third party; - Engage in any activity that is harmful, abusive, obscene, defamatory, harassing, or threatening; - Upload, post, or transmit any User Content that is illegal, harmful, abusive, obscene, defamatory, harassing, or threatening; 9. Disclaimer of Warranties This Website is only for 18+ users. Please Leave This Site If you are from Telangana, Orissa, Assam, Sikkim, and Nagaland. Beware of fraudsters, We only promote online fantasy sports 10. Limitation of Liability CRICKETX WILL NOT BE LIABLE FOR ANY DAMAGES ARISING FROM YOUR USE OF THE APP, INCLUDING BUT NOT LIMITED TO DIRECT, INDIRECT, INCIDENTAL, CONSEQUENTIAL, PUNITIVE, AND SPECIAL DAMAGES. © 2024. All rights reserved.
